PickUp.QuestName: Good Help is Hard to Find

TurnIn.QuestName: Good Help is Hard to Find

CustomBehavior.Text: Complete and turn in this quest and hit the "Continue Profile" button when ready.
CustomBehavior.Title: Life of the Party

CustomBehavior.Text: Complete and turn in this quest and hit the "Continue Profile" button when ready.
CustomBehavior.Title: Life of the Party

CustomBehavior.Text: Complete this quest by right clicky on the piggy to your right. After you do, you will begin a mini-game. Complete this mini-game and turn in the quest.
CustomBehavior.Title: The Great Bank Heist

CustomBehavior.Text:
Complete the last 3 quests in this area.

Quests:
Liberate the Kaja'mite -- Throw bombs at the green minerals, and collect the remnants.
447 -- Use the items inside the building, then use the control box by Sassy Hardwrench
Life Savings -- Talk to Sassy Hardwrench

Watch the cutscene!
CustomBehavior.Title: Complete 3 quests

CustomBehavior.Text: Complete the first quest in this area and then continue the profile.
CustomBehavior.Title: Lost Isles

CustomBehavior.Text: Throw bananas in your bags at the monkeys in this area. After that, hit "Continue Profile" to conitnue.
CustomBehavior.Title: Monkey Business

CustomBehavior.Text: If the quest timing is off, stop, abandon, and restart, or complete manually.
Use the Weed Wacker in your bags, and kill the weeds in this area. After that, hit "Continue Profile" to conitnue.
CustomBehavior.Title: Weed Wacker

CustomBehavior.Text:
Complete and turn in the following quests.

Town-In-A-Box -- Use the Town-In-A-Box item.
Hobart Needs You -- Simple run and turn in.
Cluster Cluck -- Use the quest item in your bag on the chickens.
Trading Up -- Drop an egg in the raptor traps to the east, then collect the egg that drops when the raptor dies.

Then hit "Continue Profile" to continue.
CustomBehavior.Title: Complete 4 quests

PickUp.QuestName: Who's Top of the Food Chain Now?

Objective.QuestName: Who's Top of the Food Chain Now?

TurnIn.QuestName: Who's Top of the Food Chain Now?

CustomBehavior.Text: Use the shark bot by the water, and kill the big shark. When completed, turn in.\n\nThen hit "Continue Profile" to continue.
CustomBehavior.Title: A Goblin in Shark's Clothing

CustomBehavior.Text:
Complete this quest.

Use the inflatable pony in your bags. Naga are at the bottom of the water to the east.

Then hit "Continue Profile" to continue.
CustomBehavior.Title: Irresistible Pony

PickUp.QuestName: Zombies vs. Super Booster Rocket Boots

CustomBehavior.Text:
Complete this quest.

Use the rocket boots to burn 50 zombies to the north. Turn in this quest.

Then hit "Continue Profile" to continue.
CustomBehavior.Title: Zombies vs. Super Booster Rocket Boots

CustomBehavior.Text:
Complete this quest.

Kill Volcanoth using the Bootzooka in your bags. He's in the cave to the south.

Turn in this quest and accept "Old Friends"

Then hit "Continue Profile" to continue.
CustomBehavior.Title: Volcanoth!

CustomBehavior.Text:
Complete this quest.

Mines are located on the beach. Throw Grenades at them.

Then hit "Continue Profile" to continue.
CustomBehavior.Title: Mine Disposal, the Goblin Way

CustomBehavior.Text:
Complete this quest.

Fly around and kill the Alliance planes. Land the plane.

Then hit "Continue Profile" to continue.
CustomBehavior.Title: The Pride of Kezan

CustomBehavior.Text:
Complete the cave quests.

There are 4 quests in the cave which must be completed by hand.

The Gallywix Labor Mine
Kaja'Cola Gives You IDEAS! (TM)
Morale Boost
Throw It On the Ground!

Then hit "Continue Profile" to continue.
CustomBehavior.Title: Cave quests

PickUp.QuestName: The Fastest Way to His Heart
She Loves Me, She Loves Me NOT!

Objective.QuestName: The Fastest Way to His Heart
She Loves Me, She Loves Me NOT!

CustomBehavior.Text: Complete and turn in this quest. (Just push the big red button).\n\nThen hit "Continue Profile" to continue.
CustomBehavior.Title: Cave quests

TurnIn.QuestName: She Loves Me, She Loves Me NOT!
The Fastest Way to His Heart

PickUp.QuestName: What Kind of Name is Candy, Anyway?
What Kind of Name is Chip, Anyway?

Objective.QuestName: What Kind of Name is Chip, Anyway?

TurnIn.QuestName: What Kind of Name is Chip, Anyway?

Objective.QuestName: What Kind of Name is Candy, Anyway?

TurnIn.QuestName: What Kind of Name is Candy, Anyway?

CustomBehavior.Text:
Complete this quest.

Kill the Trade Prince. He's south of you. See SKULL on minimap.

Then hit "Continue Profile" to continue.
CustomBehavior.Title: Final Confrontation

CustomBehavior.Text:
Complete this quest.

Talk to Sassy Hardwrench on the boat.

Watch cutscene.

Then hit "Continue Profile" to continue.
CustomBehavior.Title: Warchief's Emissary

Quest.Name: What Kind of Name is Candy, Anyway?
